docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This repository contains materials and projects from Cogito NTNU's introduction group. Unlike regular Cogito projects that focus on a single target throughout the semester, CogIntro covers a broad range of AI/ML topics to maximize learning. The group of 8 members met twice a week in afternoon sessions, with each subproject spanning 1-4 weeks. The progression went from foundational tooling through increasingly complex applications, ending with a deep learning project on HPC infrastructure.

docs.title: Fundamentals
docs.text: Terminal usage, Git workflows, and introductory ML concepts via Kaggle notebooks.

docs.title: Flappy Bird Agent
docs.text:
A reinforcement learning agent trained to play Flappy Bird using the OpenAI Gym framework.

[Project folder →](src/flappy-bird-gym)

docs.title: LLM Chatbot
docs.text:
A conversational chatbot built with OpenAI's Responses API.

[Project folder →](src/large-language-models)

docs.title: Tumor Segmentation on IDUN
docs.text:
Medical image segmentation using U-Net architecture, trained on NTNU's IDUN HPC cluster via SLURM. The model segments tumor regions from PET/CT scans using k-fold cross-validation.

[Project folder →](src/tumor-segmentation)

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Git: Download Git
  • Python 3.12: Download Python
  • UV: Python package manager. Install UV

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/CogitoNTNU/cogintro.git
cd cogintro
uv sync

For development:

uv run pre-commit install
